thread.title: Better photos, animated shots with new iPhones

author: Anick Jesdanun
title: Better photos, animated shots with new iPhones
text:
Photo: Eric Risberg, Associated Press The iPhone 6S and 6S Plus have an improved camera that reproduces colors more accurately. The screen sizes remain the same. The iPhone 6S and 6S Plus have an improved camera that reproduces...
Photography gets even better with Apple’s new iPhones. The iPhone 6S and 6S Plus have an improved camera that reproduces colors more accurately. The screen sizes remain the same. The iPhone 6S and 6S Plus have an improved camera that reproduces...
Photography gets even better with Apple’s new iPhones.
